solution: 1. Bring in service vehicle VIN=123412341234. 2. Disassemble engine lower and remove connecting rods. 3. Identify all service vehicles in fleet and ensure lubrication levels are at 100% at all times.
analysis: The failure is caused by age and operating conditions, leading to engine failure due to overheating and lubrication issues. Regular monitoring and servicing of lubrication levels, as well as engine components, are essential to prevent recurrence.
